      • hasChecked

        public static boolean hasChecked(Student student)
        Used to know if a student have checked.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to verify.
        Returns:
        True if he have checked in at least one group, false if not.

      • checkStudent

        public static boolean checkStudent(Student student)
        used to check a student.
        Parameters:
        student - The student to check.
        Returns:
        True if the student is been checked in at least one group, false if not.

        Parameters:

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Call when the program is starting. Initalize some variables like groups, students, logger, reader and SQL connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If files couldn't be read.
        java.lang.SecurityException - If the database connection can't be made.
        See Also:
        FileHandler.FileHandler(String, boolean)

      • getStudentByName

        public static Student getStudentByName(java.lang.String name,
                                       boolean checkDB)
        Used to get a student by his name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the student.
        checkDB - Should check him in the database if we don't know him?
        Returns:
        The student or null if unknown.

        Used to get a student by his UID.
        Parameters:
        uid - The student's card UID.
        checkDB - Should check him in the database if we don't know him?
        Returns:
        The student or null if unknown.

      • writeAbsents

        public static void writeAbsents(Period period,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Student> students,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Student> checkedStudents)
        Used to log all absents students in a CSV file with their name.
        Parameters:
        period - The period when the students haven't checked.
        students - The list of all the students that need to check.
        checkedStudents - The students that have checked.

      • containsStudent

        public static boolean containsStudent(java.util.Collection collection,
                                      Student student)
        Used to know if a collection contains a student.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to verify.
        student - The student to search for.
        Returns:
        True if in the collection, false if not.

        Used to remove a student from a list.
        Parameters:
